subject: Align manual testing guide with actual codebase
body:
Updates after verifying against source code:
- Fix header title to "Software Transaction Tool"
- Update mode names: "Inter-Company Tool" and "Pricing Calculator"
- Add correct tab navigation: Calculator, Compliance, Charts, What-If, Projections
- Update default test values (R 1,000,000 dev cost from code defaults)
- Fix Model 1 expected results with accurate calculations
- Update perspective names (developer, buyer, combined)
- Add "What Changed?" feature test case in Compare Mode
- Update Save/Load workflow with actual button names
- Fix Export/Import section with toolbar button names
- Add Clear All test case
- Include model selection modes: Overview, Wizard, Manual
